thread.section_title: Hotel 32 32 - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Hidden Gem!
thread.title_full: Hidden Gem! - Review of Hotel 32 32, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Paul K
title: Hidden Gem!
text: We booked Hotel 32 32 at the last minute and we sure are glad that we did. For Manhattan, this place is a steal. Although the lobby is practically non-existent, the room was large (by NYC standards). The room was immaculate, cleaned thoroughly everyday, and had all the amenities that you need. The wood floors and marble bathroom were a nice touch. Breakfast was next store at Cafe Silo which was w y better than what you get at most hotels. A full hot meal that was so filling that we skipped lunch a couple of days. The location is a block away form the subway and a 5-6 minute walk from Macy's. I highly recommend this hotel!
